data.title: Ambient Collection: Ambient Presets for Omnisphere 2
data.meta_description: A toolkit of 400 ambient presets for Spectrasonics Omnisphere 2, perfect for producers of ambient music and media composers. Designed to inspire.
data.text:
Transform your music and maximise your inspiration with the Ambient Collection – the ultimate ambient soundbank for Spectrasonics Omnisphere. Crafted by renowned sound designer Tom Wolfe, this collection combines the best-selling Halcyon, Halcyon Pt. 2, and Solus soundbanks to bring you 400 atmospheric ambient presets.

With each meticulously crafted preset you can immerse yourself in a world of serene textures, gentle pads, and cascading sequences that evoke a sense of spaciousness and tranquility. Whether you’re an ambient music producer or a media composer in search of inspiration, the Ambient Collection is the perfect toolkit for taking your projects to new heights.

We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. That’s why we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If for any reason you’re not inspired by the Ambient Collection, you can get a full refund – no questions asked. Buy with confidence and explore the collection risk-free.

Tom Wolfe is a British sound designer. Also an award-winning independent film composer, Tom is a prolific voice in the synthesizer preset world and, through his store tomwolfe.co.uk, has released soundbanks for some of the biggest and most popular software synthesisers and effects plugins on the market.

With his presets being celebrated for their uniqueness, creativity and usability by users and critics alike, Tom has worked with a number of industry-leading companies and his sounds have been used by Oscar-winning film composers, Grammy-winning record producers and AAA game composers.
